name: Rice Water Infused Hair Shampoo Bar
about: What it is: All-natural professional-grade shampoo bars made with Longsheng Rice Water and formulated to repair, moisturize, strengthen, & increase natural shine. Each scent is suitable for different hair types; pick based on hair concern...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Key Benefits:.- Hua Bliss (All Hair Types): Moisturizes, Strengthens & Rejuvenates Hair + Scalp.- Hidden Waterfall (All Hair Types): Increases Density, Strengthens & Rejuvenates Hair + Scalp.- Citrus Yao (Oily to Normal Hair Types): Gently Cleanses Hair & Scalp for Oil Control.- Terrace Garden (Dry to Normal Hair Types): Moisturizes, Strengthens & Rejuvenates Hair + Scalp.- Native Essence (Sensitive & Dry Hair Types): Moisturizes, Strengthens & Rejuvenates Hair + Scalp..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Longsheng Rice Water: Nourishes and repairs.- Cocoa Butter: Conditions, softens, and moisturizes.- Hydrolyzed Rice Protein: Increases volume, shine, and strength..What Else You Need to Know: Viori's mission is to create safe, natural, highly effective products that honor the values and traditions of the Red Yao women. All Viori products are 100% vegan, plastic-free, pH balanced, and cruelty-free, as well as sustainably and ethically sourced, and made without sulfates, parabens, or phthalates. For over 2,000 years, the Red Yao tribe in the rice-terraced mountains of Longsheng have been famous for their near-perfect hair. The tribe women have passed down their unique, natural method of maintaining long, strong, healthy hair with nutrient-rich Longsheng Rice™ water...Fragrance Description:.- Hua Bliss (All Hair Types): This garden-inspired scent features notes of lavender, cotton flower, and plumeria petals blended with hints of green apple, bergamot, and sheer coconut..- Hidden Waterfall (All Hair Types): A musky, sweet, vanilla-scent reminiscent of the amber aroma found along the forested paths to the hidden Longsheng waterfalls..- Citrus Yao (Oily to Normal Hair Types): A fresh burst of citrus scents, straight from the baskets of the Red Yao fruit stands..- Terrace Garden (Dry to Normal Hair Types): Natural, green, floral-scent reminiscent of wandering the bamboo trails of the Longsheng mountains..- Native Essence (Sensitive and Dry Hair Types) : No added fragrance, this bar has a light earthy, rice-bran, tea leaves scent derived from the natural ingredients added directly to this bar..Clinical Results:  In an independent consumer testing panel, participants found the following benefits after using Longsheng Rice Water for 2 weeks:.- Increases moisture levels by 70.56%.- 25.48% reduction in erythema* on scalp compared to control *erythema = reddening of the skin.- 100% of participants using the experimental product reported less flaking on the scalp for the duration of the study while 60% of participants using the control noticed more flaking.- Improves Anti-frizz by 22% compared to control..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Longsheng Rice Water: Nourishes and repairs..-Cocoa Butter: Conditions, softens, and moisturizes..-Hydrolyzed Rice Protein: Increases volume, shine, and strength...Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Coconut Acid, Oryza Sativa (Longsheng Rice) Water, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Stearic Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Lactate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Fragrance/Parfum,Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Wax, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica Seed Oil, Calcium Pantothenate, Inositol, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Oryza Sativa Flour, Lactobacillus/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..- Dampen bar and rub in palm for a few seconds until lather forms. .- Apply directly on scalp and hair in circular motions over desired areas. .- Massage thoroughly into hair and scalp then rinse thoroughly.

reviews.review_text: I am a post menopausal woman in my 50's. I have a lot of fine hair that began shedding a bit too much for my comfort! I wasn't expecting that, I bought it because it was a bar and had good ingredients (I am extra sensitive to stuff). Didn't even pay attention to the benefits of the rice water until my hair began to feel more lush. The scrunchy I could comfortably wrap twice, I can now only wrap once. I attribute new growth to this stuff. Nothing else in my routine changed, so yeah, it's this stuff. On my third bar. fyi-- I have color treated hair and my color looks great, still.

reviews.review_title: Great sustainable, vegan, cruelty-free shampoo bar
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Details: Created with Longsheng Rice water & all natural ingredients to moisturize, strengthen, rejuvenate & cleanse scalp & hair while leaving it shiny & renewed. This bar uses the same rice water prepared in the same way as the Red Yao have done for centuries. Additionally, Viori works with the Red Yao to purchase their ancient rice at a premium to create a long-term, sustainable partnership. Did I mention too that this shampoo bar is sulfate, paraben, plastic & phthalates-free, is pH balanced, 100% vegan & cruelty-free.    My experience: For reference, I have thick hair that easily weighed down by heavy products with more shedding. I have been trying to use more shampoo bars as I love that they are better for the environment & reduce waste. This shampoo bar is beautifully made (look at that design 😍) & has a delicious scent with subtle hint of vanilla & musky/herbal hints. This gently lathers & leaves my hair clean without feeling stripped. I can’t yet speak to my hair feeling stronger but my hair looks shiny & has more volume. I can’t wait to see what long term use will bring.  Overall: I am happy to have found a great shampoo bar that not only cleanses my hair & makes it shiny & adds volume but also reduces environmental waste, is sustainable & creates a long-term partnership with their suppliers. Thank you Viori for sending me this incredible new shampoo bar, I will definitely have to get the conditioner to see how it works together.

The Rice Water Shampoo Bar has transformed my hair care routine with its deep cleansing power and revitalizing effects. Infused with rice water, it effectively removes impurities and excess oil, leaving my scalp feeling refreshingly clean without stripping away moisture. While adjusting to the bar format initially requires a bit more time and effort compared to pump bottles, the results are undeniably worth it. Once mastered, the eco-friendly and sustainable packaging of this shampoo bar makes it a win-win for both my hair and the environment, offering a guilt-free way to achieve clean, healthy look.

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out Viori™ Shampoo Bar, and I must say, I’m impressed! This musky, sweet, vanilla-scented shampoo bar not only transports you to the enchanting Longsheng waterfalls with its amber aroma but also delivers on its promises of natural beauty and sustainability.  One of the standout features of this shampoo bar is its use of Longsheng Rice, a traditional ingredient and beauty secret of the Red Yao community for centuries. Knowing that it’s handcrafted with the same natural ingredients and beauty rituals used by the Red Yao adds a layer of authenticity and cultural appreciation to the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bar has a very strong scent in the package, but thankfully not nearly as strong once you use it and leave it in the shower (and doesn't stick in the hair). For me at least, I didn't want my hair to smell like perfume, even if the Hidden Waterfall scent wasn't bad. The shampoo bar itself is nice! It gets a good clean, doesn't seem to strip the hair, and leaves enough hydration. It also seems firm enough to stay in one piece in the shower for a while, which I like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! Almost like a perfume. I love the ease of this and how easy it is to pack it for travel. reviews.review_title: Shocked at How Much I Fell In Love With This!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the past 7 months I have been letting my gray hair grow in. I am 39 years old and absolutely love my gray. The bad part is my hair was so damaged with bleaching/dying/heat treatments. While researching best (natural) shampoo/conditioners - Viori was a consistent result. Since using Viori, my scalp is healthier with no build-up, my hair is VERY noticable shiner and stronger. I never thought my split-ends would be controlled but - my hair stylist told me she has never seen my hair so healthy before. Prior to Viori, I never heard of shampoo/conditioner bars, yet I threw caution to the wind and haven't looked back. These bars last 2x's longer (for me) than the previous bottle products I used. Even better - I love a company that gives back. With each sale, a % goes back to the Red Yao tribe, where they get the rice to make the shampoo/conditioner. Did I forget to tell you this is Vegan - Sulfate Free - Paraben Free?! I will always recommend the Viori products, and now my beautician does as well. They have something for all hair types but my favorite is Hidden Waterfall scent. It's sweet with hints of vanilla and a touch of amber. Warm would be a good way to describe it. I wet my hair, rub the bar around my scalp (maybe 4 big circles), scrub like normal then rinse. Then I rub the bar on the ends of my hair and let it sit while I shave or sing my favorite song. Following my mini concert, I do 2 scalp circles with the bar, rub everything in and do a final rinse. On this rinse I do a cool water rinse. Not required, just personal preference. Try it - Give it a week - You will never look back!

reviews.review_title: Great new conditioner to add into my routine.

reviews.review_text: This was my first time using a conditioner bar and I really enjoyed it. I’ve been using the Viori hair conditioner bar in the scent Hidden Waterfall, and I would definitely recommend it for most people. The hidden waterfall scent is fantastic. It has notes of sandalwood, amber, and jasmine and has a musky feel to it. To use the bar you simply lather it in your hands and apply to your hair just as you would a regular conditioner. Let it sit, then rinse. It left my hair feeling very soft, without weighing it down or feeling oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Viori conditioner in the scent Hidden waterfall definitely has a strong musk vanilla  scent, almost powdery in a way. You can really tell that it is a product with rice in it from the scent which I find to be actually nice. The scent kind of reminds me of those scented soaps that my aunt or grandma would have in their bathrooms in the 1990s that were there simply for decoration.  When I first lathered the bar in my hands I wasn't getting much and at first worried it wouldn't be conditioning enough for my hair so I took the bar directly to my hair and the product glided right on leaving smooth silky conditioner on my hair. I focused on the ends and worked up the length of my hair avoiding my scalp area. I am really impressed with how silky it felt with the conditioner in my hair. When I rinsed, my hair still felt silky but not like the conditioner wouldn't wash out. I let my hair air dry and I was able to brush my hair without any tangles which is a really rare thing for me being that I have super fine hair that tangles from simply shaking my head! I am really impressed with how well the conditioner bar works for giving hair moisture and what it did for my fine hair and tangles. It isn't heavy at all either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Certainly! Here's a simulated review for the VIORI Hair Shampoo Bar that you might find at a place like Sephora:  ---  Title: A Game-Changer for My Hair and the Environment!  Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)  I recently decided to switch to a more sustainable hair care routine and stumbled upon the VIORI Hair Shampoo Bar at Sephora. I was a bit skeptical at first, wondering how a bar could possibly replace my liquid shampoo, but I'm so glad I gave it a try!  First off, the packaging is minimal and eco-friendly, which I absolutely love. There's no plastic involved, and it feels great to reduce my environmental impact. The bar itself is easy to use—just a few swipes across my wet hair and it lathers up beautifully.  The scent is divine! It's fresh and not overpowering, leaving my hair smelling amazing for hours. But the real magic is in how my hair feels and looks after drying. My hair has never felt softer or looked shinier. I have noticed a significant reduction in frizz, and my hair feels healthier overall. Plus, the bar lasts so long, offering great value for the price.  I'm genuinely impressed with the VIORI Hair Shampoo Bar. It's not only a fantastic product for my hair but also aligns with my goals to be more eco-conscious. I'll definitely repurchase and recommend it to anyone looking to make a switch to more sustainable hair care options.  Pros: - Eco-friendly packaging - Easy to use and lathers well - Leaves hair soft, shiny, and healthy-looking - Long-lasting  Cons: - None so far!  If you're on the fence about trying a shampoo bar, let the VIORI Hair Shampoo Bar be your first. It's a simple switch with impactful benefits for both your hair and the planet.  ---  This review is a fictional simulation and should be adapted or used as inspiration for your own unique review.

I recommend this brand to everyone I know and everyone I've convinced to make the switch agrees that this is an incredibly superior product. Try it and thank me later!

reviews.review_text: This rice water shampoo is fantastic and did a great job. It lathers well and almost feels like regular shampoo. Rinses out well too. It’s eco friendly.- no plastic, everything is biodegradable. That’s such a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bar shampoo. The rice water is a game changer-my hair feels so soft. One thing I will say is be careful you don’t keep the bar where it can get directly hit by the water or else it will get messed up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very hydrating shampoo bar. Usually, when I use shampoo bars they can be a bit stripping, but this one was over all well rounded. It lathers up super foamy, cleans scalp and gets rid of build up, but also keeps hair feeling hydrated. I have super dry curly hair so I have to make sure my products aren’t stripping. This isn’t like that all! It leaves the hair quite soft. I’m interested to see where this goes as rice extract is said to be super good for hair. The only thing some may not like is it’s very perfumed. I don’t mind however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to Viroi last year and love their line of bars. The Hidden Waterfall and Peach Hibiscus are my favorite scents. Both the shampoo and conditioner bars are easy to use and I love the results and definitely feel like it thoroughly cleans. My hair is always soft and the frizz significantly lessened. It doesn't weigh your hair down and I like that my hair is still shiny. Totally worth checking out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Viory for over a year now and I love it! The bars literally last forever and gives a really deep clean. I’ve noticed my hair has grown faster since using this as well. I use it 2-3 times a week alternating my regular shampoo and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I opened the box, the smell hit me! It smells sooooo good and refreshing. I love how soft it made my hair feel. No squeaky feelings. My scalp feels so clean and detoxed. I have really dry hair and it left it feelings so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Viori Hidden Waterfall Shampoo Bar is amazing. The scent is so soothing and refreshing! My hair feels so smooth and soft after using this product 2-3x per week. Highly recommend for all hair care lovers’

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo bar from Viori is such a cool one. Not only it refreshes my hair and smells nice but also it is very environmentally friendly. It’s super travel friendly too. The price point is also ok. I think it’s worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed! Its rich lather leaves my hair feeling clean and refreshed without any residue. The natural ingredients provide a pleasant scent, and the bar's eco-friendly packaging is a big plus. A great alternative to traditional liquid shampoos. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay first off the packaging is also sustainable and adorable😍! The smell is amazing and has a wonderful musk type smell. It lathers very well and makes my hair feel so soft and clean. Since using for about a week it’s grown at least 1 inch! ( gifted by viori)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love the shampoo nothing gets my hair as clean as the shampoo. It also helps volumise my hair and I have seen so much hair growth with it. I swear by this stuff and it is at such a great price point too. I have been repurchasing for the past year!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Viori Hidden Waterfall Conditioner Bar smells so good, you can smell it through the packaging. It makes a decent amount of lather. I only applied it to the bottom third of my hair, avoiding my roots. It is made from a rice water formula. My hair felt silky after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love eco friendly products like this without all the plastics. It’s smells like musky, sweet, vanilla-scented shampoo bar reminiscent of the amber aroma found along the forested paths to hidden Longsheng waterfalls.

I love how clean and soft this makes my hair feel after washing it. It pairs perfectly with their condition bar and I love that it’s a bar rather than a bottle because it is less wasteful. It has very clean ingredients and subtle scent which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I really like that this bar shampoo is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty free, and comes in recyclable packaging. This shampoo smells so good and it’s so easy to use it. My hair looks so shiny, cleans and hydrated. It did not irritate my scalp at all. I’m very happy with it and I would highly recommend it. Gifted by viori

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smells are absolutely beautiful, lathers much better than I thought they would. The comb is a nice addition. My only complaint, and it's totally a me thing, my hair is very curly, and dry! So I have to use extra curl product after my hair washing day to make my hair not as dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used viori’s shampoo and conditioner bars before, for a while, because they’re the only ones that actually work and don’t feel like you used soap to wash your hair. This scent is really nice and subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo bar! I never tried it before but this makes me want to use more shampoo bar. It smells very good and relaxing and my hair feels clean afterwards! It’s easy to use! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: oh my gosh this product is so cool and I love how easy it is to travel with. I have been using it when I go camping and it is so simple to use. makes my hair so clean and soft. super easy to use. smells good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so much fun to use! Felt simpler and quicker than traditional shampoo bottles. Left my hair feeling completely cleansed and moisturized! I loved the smell too and the ingredients it contained.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first time using a shampoo bar and I’m liking it so far. Its compact form is eco-friendly, and the lather is surprisingly rich and nourishing. The rice extract leaves my hair feeling clean and soft. The bar is long-lasting, making it a sustainable option. A fantastic choice for those who appreciate an environmentally conscious alternative to traditional shampoo bottles.

reviews.review_title: Lavender and Plumeria Very Refreshing to Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried this lavender bar would be super scented on my hair but it has a really pretty scent to it. I think the lavender and plumeria formula cleans the hair with less residue than the citrus yao formula, but my hair is thin and fine so a little coating is good for my type of hair. I'll see how it ends up. I am finding the lavender and plumeria shampoo bar refreshing.

reviews.review_title: Would spend money on another brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As an avid shampoo bar user, I definitely had better from cheaper brand. The smell is pretty non-existent which is a shame! It doesn't moisturizes my scalp or hair, it didn't increase my natural shine and it leaves my hair roots greasy and heavy if I don't shampoo twice and yet makes my ends very dry. Though I can say it lather very well compare to some other brand I've used before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saw a lot of great things about this shampoo bar, and the bought a gift to set. however, after using it for a couple months, I found it ￼hard to lather and gives me flat hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am honestly really impressed by this product. I've never used a shampoo bar before, but to my surprise, I love it! It leaves my hair super shiny and soft, and it has a great lather, which I did not expect. I would definitely recommend using this shampoo but a conditioner/mask from another brand of your choice. Really hope Sephora continues selling this
I end up not finishing my Shampoo and Conditioner with Viori due to my hair starting to get so oily and dandruff, and i even had a unopened shampoo bar unfortunately I can’t      present

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: lathers so nicely, leaving hair feeling clean and light! smells divine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for a month now and I just can’t finish it. This shampoo bar does leave my hair feeling soft, however, the hair loss and itchy scalp are really problematic for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, seems to last a very long time, lathers really nicely. It has done some damage to my hair tho! At first I was like, whatever it smells good I'll keep trying, but it's just made my ends brittle with so much breakage. I've even cut off 4 inches to see if that would help, and still brittle. My hair has that squeaky sound when I'm washing it out too, and immediately soooo tangled. I've been using a really nice salon conditioner with it more often than usual bc it gets so tangled. I have longer hair, it's thin but I've got a lottttttt of hair, red head so I shed a lot as well. The Hidden Waterfall smells great! I wish there were more options for bar shampoo and conditioner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For context I have fine, straight hair and an oily scalp, but I get my hair processed from a level 7 brunette to a level 9-10 blonde in certain areas, so I cannot speak to how this works on thick or curly hair.   That being said, I’ve almost finished a full size of this after finishing a mini a couple months ago. It leaves my hair soft, thoroughly cleansed, and not too greasy. I really like it and use it as my main shampoo during the week other than my clarifying treatment and toner :)   It is a little bit hard at first to get used to using it and getting a good lather. You have to have VERY wet hair, like saturated with water and not squeezed out at all, to get a decent lather, and it takes an extra minute or two to get the product dispersed through your hair. I recommend splitting the hair down the middle and working in 2-4 sections if you’re having trouble working it into different parts of the scalp, but that honestly makes it sound a lot more complicated than it is.   I could potentially see this being too drying for curly hair or too much for damaged hair because you do have to use quite a bit more friction on the hair to create a lather than you would with a traditional shampoo, but for me, doing a hair mask and a conditioner usually solves that.   Also I see some people complain about mold, I haven’t had that problem at all. You can’t just leave it in your shower, I usually take mine out when I’m done and leave it on a piece of parchment paper (or the bamboo holder you can buy from Viori) until it dries and then wrap it up a few hours later and stick it in a drawer.  Overall, I think it’s a great plastic-free option, suitable for oily hair, and salon results for way less cost. Give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought I would love a shampoo bar. This shampoo works well with my thick oily hair. I can go 3 days without washing my hair. the shampoo lathers well, and it's easy to get used to. I use the unscented version.  I have thick, oily, healthy hair (no heating tools or dyes). I use silk pillow cases only and use a mix of nylon + boars head brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been going through a phase of trying various shampoos for my aging hair which is starting to lack volume and very dry from colouring. I couldn’t believe the difference after just one use!! My hair was full of volume and shine like it use to be! I’m very excited to have stumbled on this and it smells so good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never used a shampoo like this before and I’m so glad I got a sample which I still am using because this stuff lasts SO LONG 🩵 makes my hair feel and look beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it lathers nicely, but it's kinda drying to the scalp. the smell was a bit too strong as well. I probably won't buy it again unless it's summer humid.
